body_html: @carpodaster I guess I found another thing to repair: I was able to add a conference with "Starts on" and "Ends on" dates like: 20 Jul 16 - 07 Jul 16. The form shouldn't permit user to add such dates and should show error message. Am I right?
body_text: @carpodaster I guess I found another thing to repair: I was able to add a conference with "Starts on" and "Ends on" dates like: 20 Jul 16 - 07 Jul 16. The form shouldn't permit user to add such dates and should show error message. Am I right?
body: @carpodaster I guess I found another thing to repair: I was able to add a conference with "Starts on" and "Ends on" dates like: 20 Jul 16 - 07 Jul 16. The form shouldn't permit user to add such dates and should show error message. Am I right?
